parameters.query:
SELECT
  'planning' as database_name,
  current_timestamp as backup_timestamp,
  (
    SELECT string_agg(
      'INSERT INTO ' || tablename || ' SELECT * FROM ' || tablename || ';',
      E'\n'
    )
    FROM pg_tables
    WHERE schemaname = 'public'
  ) as backup_note,
  (
    SELECT json_agg(row_to_json(r))
    FROM restaurants r
  ) as restaurants,
  (
    SELECT json_agg(row_to_json(e))
    FROM employees e
  ) as employees,
  (
    SELECT json_agg(row_to_json(s))
    FROM shifts s
  ) as shifts,
  (
    SELECT json_agg(row_to_json(a))
    FROM absences a
  ) as absences,
  (
    SELECT json_agg(row_to_json(m))
    FROM missions m
  ) as missions,
  (
    SELECT json_agg(row_to_json(av))
    FROM availabilities av
  ) as availabilities,
  (
    SELECT json_agg(row_to_json(lb))
    FROM leave_balance lb
  ) as leave_balance;

SELECT
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM restaurants) as restaurants,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees) as employees,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees WHERE active = TRUE) as active_employees,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM employees WHERE is_mobile = TRUE) as mobile_employees,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM shifts) as shifts,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM shifts WHERE date >= CURRENT_DATE) as upcoming_shifts,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM absences) as absences,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM absences WHERE status = 'approved') as approved_absences,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM absences WHERE status = 'requested') as pending_absences,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM missions) as missions,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM availabilities) as availabilities,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM leave_balance) as leave_balances;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS app_config (
    key VARCHAR(100) PRIMARY KEY,
    value JSONB NOT NULL,
    updated_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);

INSERT INTO app_config (key, value, updated_at)
VALUES ('llm_config', '{{ $json.config }}'::jsonb, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
ON CONFLICT (key) DO UPDATE SET
  value = EXCLUDED.value,
  updated_at = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
RETURNING *;

values.content: You are a helpful assistant. Respond briefly.

parameters.query:
SELECT 
  e.id,
  e.last_name,
  e.first_name,
  e.phone,
  e.email,
  r.name as restaurant,
  e.is_mobile,
  array_to_string(e.positions, ',') as positions,
  e.active,
  e.hire_date,
  e.created_at
FROM employees e
LEFT JOIN restaurants r ON e.restaurant_id = r.id
ORDER BY e.id;

SELECT 
  s.id,
  e.last_name as employee_last_name,
  e.first_name as employee_first_name,
  r.name as restaurant,
  s.date,
  s.start_time,
  s.end_time,
  s.break_start,
  s.break_duration,
  s.position,
  s.is_mission,
  s.status,
  s.notes,
  s.created_at
FROM shifts s
LEFT JOIN employees e ON s.employee_id = e.id
LEFT JOIN restaurants r ON s.restaurant_id = r.id
ORDER BY s.date, s.start_time;

SELECT 
  a.id,
  e.last_name as employee_last_name,
  e.first_name as employee_first_name,
  a.type,
  a.start_date,
  a.end_date,
  a.status,
  a.comment,
  a.approved_by,
  a.approval_date,
  a.created_at
FROM absences a
LEFT JOIN employees e ON a.employee_id = e.id
ORDER BY a.start_date;
